input: If the PM belonged to the upper House of Parliament?

options.A: He will not be able to vote in his favour in the event of a no- confidence motion.
options.B: He will not be able to speak on the budget in the Lower House.
options.C: He can make statements only in the Upper House.
options.D: He has to become a member of the Lower House within six months after swearing in as the PM.
